00060 Master::Master(ConnectionManagerPtr &connManagerPtr, PropertiesPtr &props_ptr, ApplicationQueuePtr &appQueuePtr) : m_props_ptr(props_ptr), m_conn_manager_ptr(connManagerPtr), m_app_queue_ptr(appQueuePtr), m_verbose(false), m_dfs_client(0), m_initialized(false) {
00061   int error;
00062   Client *dfsClient;
00063   uint16_t port;
00064 
00065   m_server_map_iter = m_server_map.begin();
00066   
00067   m_hyperspace_ptr = new Hyperspace::Session(connManagerPtr->get_comm(), props_ptr, &m_hyperspace_session_handler);
00068 
00069   if (!m_hyperspace_ptr->wait_for_connection(30)) {
00070     HT_ERROR("Unable to connect to hyperspace, exiting...");
00071     exit(1);
00072   }
00073 
00074   m_verbose = props_ptr->get_bool("Hypertable.Verbose", false);
00075 
00076   if ((port = (uint16_t)props_ptr->get_int("Hypertable.Master.Port", 0)) == 0) {
00077     HT_ERROR("Hypertable.Master.Port property not found in config file, exiting...");
00078     exit(1);
00079   }
00080 
00081   m_max_range_bytes = props_ptr->get_int64("Hypertable.RangeServer.Range.MaxBytes", 200000000LL);
00082 
00086   dfsClient = new DfsBroker::Client(connManagerPtr, props_ptr);
00087 
00088   if (m_verbose) {
00089     cout << "DfsBroker.Host=" << props_ptr->get("DfsBroker.Host", "") << endl;
00090     cout << "DfsBroker.Port=" << props_ptr->get("DfsBroker.Port", "") << endl;
00091     cout << "DfsBroker.Timeout=" << props_ptr->get("DfsBroker.Timeout", "") << endl;
00092   }
00093 
00094   if (!dfsClient->wait_for_connection(30)) {
00095     HT_ERROR("Unable to connect to DFS Broker, exiting...");
00096     exit(1);
00097   }
00098 
00099   m_dfs_client = dfsClient;
00100 
00101   atomic_set(&m_last_table_id, 0);
00102 
00103   if (!initialize())
00104     exit(1);
00105 
00106   /* Read Last Table ID */
00107   {
00108     DynamicBuffer valueBuf(0);
00109     HandleCallbackPtr nullHandleCallback;
00110     int ival;
00111     uint32_t lockStatus;
00112     uint32_t oflags = OPEN_FLAG_READ | OPEN_FLAG_WRITE | OPEN_FLAG_LOCK;
00113 
00114     if ((error = m_hyperspace_ptr->open("/hypertable/master", oflags, nullHandleCallback, &m_master_file_handle)) != Error::OK) {
00115       HT_ERRORF("Unable to open Hyperspace file '/hypertable/master' (%s)  Try re-running with --initialize",
00116                    Error::get_text(error));
00117       exit(1);
00118     }
00119 
00120     if ((error = m_hyperspace_ptr->try_lock(m_master_file_handle, LOCK_MODE_EXCLUSIVE, &lockStatus, &m_master_file_sequencer)) != Error::OK) {
00121       HT_ERRORF("Problem obtaining exclusive lock on master Hyperspace file '/hypertable/master' - %s", Error::get_text(error));
00122       exit(1);
00123     }
00124     
00125     if (lockStatus != LOCK_STATUS_GRANTED) {
00126       HT_ERROR("Unable to obtain lock on '/hypertable/master' - conflict");
00127       exit(1);
00128     }
00129 
00130     // Write master location in 'address' attribute, format is IP:port
00131     {
00132       String hostStr, addrStr;
00133       struct hostent *he;
00134       InetAddr::get_hostname(hostStr);
00135       if ((he = gethostbyname(hostStr.c_str())) == 0) {
00136         HT_ERRORF("Problem obtaining address for hostname '%s'", hostStr.c_str());
00137         exit(1);
00138       }
00139       addrStr = String(inet_ntoa(*(struct in_addr *)*he->h_addr_list)) + ":" + (int)port;
00140       if ((error = m_hyperspace_ptr->attr_set(m_master_file_handle, "address", addrStr.c_str(), strlen(addrStr.c_str()))) != Error::OK) {
00141         HT_ERRORF("Problem setting attribute 'address' of hyperspace file /hypertable/master - %s", Error::get_text(error));
00142         exit(1);
00143       }
00144     }
00145 
00146     if ((error = m_hyperspace_ptr->attr_get(m_master_file_handle, "last_table_id", valueBuf)) != Error::OK) {
00147       if (error == Error::HYPERSPACE_ATTR_NOT_FOUND) {
00148         uint32_t table_id = 0;
00149         if ((error = m_hyperspace_ptr->attr_set(m_master_file_handle, "last_table_id", &table_id, sizeof(int32_t))) != Error::OK) {
00150           HT_ERRORF("Problem setting attribute 'last_table_id' of file /hypertable/master - %s", Error::get_text(error));
00151           exit(1);
00152         }
00153         ival = 0;
00154       }
00155       else {
00156         HT_ERRORF("Problem getting attribute 'last_table_id' from file /hypertable/master - %s", Error::get_text(error));
00157         exit(1);
00158       }
00159     }
00160     else {
00161       assert(valueBuf.fill() == sizeof(int32_t));
00162       memcpy(&ival, valueBuf.base, sizeof(int32_t));
00163     }
00164 
00165     atomic_set(&m_last_table_id, ival);
00166     if (m_verbose)
00167       cout << "Last Table ID: " << ival << endl;
00168   }
00169 
00173   scan_servers_directory();
00174 
00175   master_gc_start(props_ptr, m_threads, m_metadata_table_ptr, m_dfs_client);
00176 }

00199 void Master::server_left(const String &location) {
00200   boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(m_mutex);
00201   int error;
00202   uint32_t lockStatus;
00203   struct LockSequencerT lockSequencer;
00204   ServerMapT::iterator iter = m_server_map.find(location);
00205   String hsFilename = (String)"/hypertable/servers/" + location;
00206 
00207   if (iter == m_server_map.end()) {
00208     HT_WARNF("Server (%s) not found in map", location.c_str());
00209     return;
00210   }
00211 
00212   // if we're about to delete the item pointing to the server map iterator, then advance the iterator
00213   if (iter == m_server_map_iter)
00214     m_server_map_iter++;
00215 
00216   if ((error = m_hyperspace_ptr->try_lock((*iter).second->hyperspaceHandle, LOCK_MODE_EXCLUSIVE, &lockStatus, &lockSequencer)) != Error::OK) {
00217     HT_ERRORF("Problem obtaining exclusive lock on master Hyperspace file '/hypertable/master' - %s", Error::get_text(error));
00218     return;
00219   }
00220 
00221   if (lockStatus != LOCK_STATUS_GRANTED) {
00222     HT_INFOF("Unable to obtain lock on server file %s, ignoring...", location.c_str());
00223     return;
00224   }
00225 
00226   m_hyperspace_ptr->unlink(hsFilename);
00227   m_hyperspace_ptr->close((*iter).second->hyperspaceHandle);
00228   m_server_map.erase(iter);
00229 
00230   HT_INFOF("RangeServer lost it's lock on file %s, deleting ...", hsFilename.c_str());
00231   cout << flush;
00232 
00236 }

00243 void Master::create_table(ResponseCallback *cb, const char *tableName, const char *schemaString) {
00244   int error;
00245   String errMsg;
00246   String table_name_str = tableName;
00247 
00248 #if defined(__APPLE__)
00249   boost::to_upper(table_name_str);
00250 #endif  
00251 
00252   if ((error = create_table(table_name_str.c_str(), schemaString, errMsg)) != Error::OK)
00253     cb->error(error, errMsg);
00254   else
00255     cb->response_ok();
00256 }

00262 void Master::get_schema(ResponseCallbackGetSchema *cb, const char *tableName) {
00263   int error = Error::OK;
00264   String tableFile = (String)"/hypertable/tables/" + tableName;
00265   String errMsg;
00266   DynamicBuffer schemaBuf(0);
00267   uint64_t handle;
00268   bool exists;
00269   HandleCallbackPtr nullHandleCallback;
00270 
00274   if ((error = m_hyperspace_ptr->exists(tableFile, &exists)) != Error::OK) {
00275     errMsg = (String)"Problem checking for existence of table '" + tableName + "' - " + Error::get_text(error);
00276     goto abort;
00277   }
00278 
00282   if ((error = m_hyperspace_ptr->open(tableFile, OPEN_FLAG_READ, nullHandleCallback, &handle)) != Error::OK) {
00283     errMsg = "Unable to open Hyperspace table file '" + tableFile + "' (" + Error::get_text(error) + ")";
00284     goto abort;
00285   }
00286 
00290   if ((error = m_hyperspace_ptr->attr_get(handle, "schema", schemaBuf)) != Error::OK) {
00291     errMsg = "Problem getting attribute 'schema' for table file '" + tableFile + "'";
00292     goto abort;
00293   }
00294 
00295   m_hyperspace_ptr->close(handle);
00296   
00297   cb->response((char *)schemaBuf.base);
00298 
00299   if (m_verbose) {
00300     HT_INFOF("Successfully fetched schema (length=%d) for table '%s'", strlen((char *)schemaBuf.base), tableName);
00301   }
00302 
00303  abort:
00304   if (error != Error::OK) {
00305     if (m_verbose) {
00306       HT_ERRORF("%s '%s'", Error::get_text(error), errMsg.c_str());
00307     }
00308     cb->error(error, errMsg);
00309   }
00310   return;
00311 }

00318 void Master::register_server(ResponseCallback *cb, const char *location, struct sockaddr_in &addr) {
00319   boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(m_mutex);
00320   int error;
00321   RangeServerStatePtr statePtr;
00322   ServerMapT::iterator iter;
00323   struct sockaddr_in alias;
00324   uint32_t oflags = OPEN_FLAG_READ | OPEN_FLAG_WRITE | OPEN_FLAG_LOCK;
00325   HandleCallbackPtr lockFileHandler;
00326   uint32_t lockStatus;
00327   struct LockSequencerT lockSequencer;
00328   String hsFilename;
00329 
00330   HT_EXPECT((iter = m_server_map.find(location)) == m_server_map.end(), Error::FAILED_EXPECTATION);
00331 
00332   statePtr = new RangeServerState();
00333   statePtr->location = location;
00334   statePtr->addr = addr;
00335 
00336   if (!LocationCache::location_to_addr(location, alias)) {
00337     HT_ERRORF("Problem creating address from location '%s'", location);
00338     cb->error(Error::INVALID_METADATA, (String)"Unable to convert location '" + location + "' to address");
00339     return;
00340   }
00341   else {
00342     Comm *comm = m_conn_manager_ptr->get_comm();
00343     comm->set_alias(addr, alias);
00344   }
00345 
00346   hsFilename = (String)"/hypertable/servers/" + location;
00347 
00348   lockFileHandler = new ServerLockFileHandler(statePtr, this, m_app_queue_ptr);
00349 
00350   if ((error = m_hyperspace_ptr->open(hsFilename, oflags, lockFileHandler, &statePtr->hyperspaceHandle)) != Error::OK) {
00351     HT_ERRORF("Problem opening discovered server file %s - %s", hsFilename.c_str(), Error::get_text(error));
00352     cb->error(error, (String)"Problem opening discovered server file '" + hsFilename + "'");
00353     return;
00354   }
00355 
00356   if ((error = m_hyperspace_ptr->try_lock(statePtr->hyperspaceHandle, LOCK_MODE_EXCLUSIVE, &lockStatus, &lockSequencer)) != Error::OK) {
00357     HT_ERRORF("Problem attempting to obtain exclusive lock on server Hyperspace file '%s' - %s",
00358                  hsFilename.c_str(), Error::get_text(error));
00359     cb->error(error, (String)"Problem attempting to obtain exclusive lock on server Hyperspace file '" + hsFilename + "'");
00360     return;
00361   }
00362 
00363   if (lockStatus == LOCK_STATUS_GRANTED) {
00364     HT_INFOF("Obtained lock on servers file %s, removing...", hsFilename.c_str());
00365     if ((error = m_hyperspace_ptr->unlink(hsFilename)) != Error::OK)
00366       HT_INFOF("Problem deleting Hyperspace file %s", hsFilename.c_str());
00367     if ((error = m_hyperspace_ptr->close(statePtr->hyperspaceHandle)) != Error::OK)
00368       HT_INFOF("Problem closing handle on deleting Hyperspace file %s", hsFilename.c_str());
00369   }
00370   else
00371     m_server_map[statePtr->location] = statePtr;  
00372 
00373   {
00374     String addrStr;
00375     HT_INFOF("Server Registered %s -> %s", location, InetAddr::string_format(addrStr, addr));
00376     cout << flush;
00377   }
00378 
00379   cb->response_ok();
00380 
00384   if (!m_initialized) {
00385     int error;
00386     TableIdentifier table;
00387     RangeSpec range;
00388     RangeServerClient rsc(m_conn_manager_ptr->get_comm(), 30);
00389 
00393     {
00394       String errMsg;
00395       String metadataSchemaFile = System::installDir + "/conf/METADATA.xml";
00396       off_t schemaLen;
00397       const char *schemaStr = FileUtils::file_to_buffer(metadataSchemaFile.c_str(), &schemaLen);
00398 
00399       if ((error = create_table("METADATA", schemaStr, errMsg)) != Error::OK) {
00400         HT_ERRORF("Problem creating METADATA table - %s", Error::get_text(error));
00401         return;
00402       }
00403     }
00404 
00408     m_metadata_table_ptr = new Table(m_props_ptr, m_conn_manager_ptr->get_comm(), m_hyperspace_ptr, "METADATA");
00409 
00410     m_metadata_table_ptr->get_identifier(&table);
00411     table.name = "METADATA";
00412 
00416     range.start_row = 0;
00417     range.end_row = Key::END_ROOT_ROW;
00418 
00419     try {
00420       RangeState range_state;
00421       range_state.soft_limit = m_max_range_bytes;
00422       rsc.load_range(alias, table, range, 0, range_state, 0);
00423     }
00424     catch (Exception &e) {
00425       String addrStr;
00426       HT_ERRORF("Problem issuing 'load range' command for %s[..%s] at server %s - %s",
00427                 table.name, range.end_row, InetAddr::string_format(addrStr, alias), Error::get_text(e.code()));
00428     }
00429 
00430 
00435     TableMutatorPtr mutator_ptr;
00436     KeySpec key;
00437     String metadata_key_str;
00438 
00439     mutator_ptr = m_metadata_table_ptr->create_mutator();
00440 
00441     metadata_key_str = String("0:") + Key::END_ROW_MARKER;
00442     key.row = metadata_key_str.c_str();
00443     key.row_len = metadata_key_str.length();
00444     key.column_qualifier = 0;
00445     key.column_qualifier_len = 0;
00446 
00447     try {
00448       key.column_family = "StartRow";
00449       mutator_ptr->set(0, key, (uint8_t *)Key::END_ROOT_ROW, strlen(Key::END_ROOT_ROW));
00450       mutator_ptr->flush();
00451     }
00452     catch (Hypertable::Exception &e) {
00453       // TODO: propagate exception
00454       HT_ERRORF("METADATA update error (row_key = %s) - %s : %s", metadata_key_str.c_str(), e.what(), Error::get_text(e.code()));
00455       exit(1);
00456     }
00457 
00461     range.start_row = Key::END_ROOT_ROW;
00462     range.end_row = Key::END_ROW_MARKER;
00463 
00464     try {
00465       RangeState range_state;
00466       range_state.soft_limit = m_max_range_bytes;
00467       rsc.load_range(alias, table, range, 0, range_state, 0);
00468     }
00469     catch (Exception &e) {
00470       String addrStr;
00471       HT_ERRORF("Problem issuing 'load range' command for %s[..%s] at server %s - %s",
00472                 table.name, range.end_row, InetAddr::string_format(addrStr, alias), Error::get_text(e.code()));
00473     }
00474 
00475     m_initialized = true;
00476   }
00477 
00478 }

00486 void Master::report_split(ResponseCallback *cb, TableIdentifier &table, RangeSpec &range, const char *transfer_log_dir, uint64_t soft_limit) {
00487   struct sockaddr_in addr;
00488   RangeServerClient rsc(m_conn_manager_ptr->get_comm(), 30);
00489 
00490   HT_INFOF("Entering report_split for %s[%s:%s].", table.name, range.start_row, range.end_row);
00491 
00492   cb->response_ok();
00493 
00494   {
00495     boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(m_mutex);
00496     if (m_server_map_iter == m_server_map.end())
00497       m_server_map_iter = m_server_map.begin();
00498     assert(m_server_map_iter != m_server_map.end());
00499     memcpy(&addr, &((*m_server_map_iter).second->addr), sizeof(struct sockaddr_in));
00500     HT_INFOF("Assigning newly reported range %s[%s:%s] to %s", table.name, range.start_row, range.end_row, (*m_server_map_iter).first.c_str());
00501     m_server_map_iter++;
00502   }
00503 
00504   //cb->get_address(addr);
00505 
00506   try {
00507     RangeState range_state;
00508     range_state.soft_limit = soft_limit;
00509     rsc.load_range(addr, table, range, transfer_log_dir, range_state, 0);
00510     HT_INFOF("report_split for %s[%s:%s] successful.", table.name, range.start_row, range.end_row);
00511   }
00512   catch (Exception &e) {
00513     String addrStr;
00514     HT_ERRORF("Problem issuing 'load range' command for %s[%s:%s] at server %s - %s",
00515               table.name, range.start_row, range.end_row, InetAddr::string_format(addrStr, addr), Error::get_text(e.code()));
00516   }
00517 
00518 }
00519 
00520 void Master::drop_table(ResponseCallback *cb, const char *table_name, bool if_exists) {
00521   int error = Error::OK;
00522   int saved_error = Error::OK;
00523   String err_msg;
00524   String table_file = (String)"/hypertable/tables/" + table_name;
00525   DynamicBuffer value_buf(0);
00526   int ival;
00527   HandleCallbackPtr nullHandleCallback;
00528   uint64_t handle;
00529   String table_name_str = table_name;
00530 
00531 #if defined(__APPLE__)
00532   boost::to_upper(table_name_str);
00533 #endif
00534 
00538   if ((error = m_hyperspace_ptr->open(table_file.c_str(), OPEN_FLAG_READ, nullHandleCallback, &handle)) != Error::OK) {
00539     if (if_exists && error == Error::HYPERSPACE_BAD_PATHNAME)
00540       cb->response_ok();
00541     else
00542       cb->error(error, (String)"Problem opening file '" + table_file + "'");
00543     return;
00544   }
00545 
00549   if ((error = m_hyperspace_ptr->attr_get(handle, "table_id", value_buf)) != Error::OK) {
00550     HT_ERRORF("Problem getting attribute 'table_id' from file '%s' - %s", table_file.c_str(), Error::get_text(error));
00551     cb->error(error, (String)"Problem reading attribute 'table_id' from file '" + table_file + "'");
00552     return;
00553   }
00554 
00558   if ((error = m_hyperspace_ptr->close(handle)) != Error::OK) {
00559     HT_ERRORF("Problem closing hyperspace handle %lld - %s", (long long int)handle, Error::get_text(error));
00560   }
00561 
00562   assert(value_buf.fill() == sizeof(int32_t));
00563 
00564   memcpy(&ival, value_buf.base, sizeof(int32_t));
00565 
00566   {
00567     char start_row[16];
00568     char end_row[16];
00569     TableScannerPtr scanner_ptr;
00570     ScanSpec scan_spec;
00571     Cell cell;
00572     String location_str;
00573     std::set<String> unique_locations;
00574     TableIdentifier table;
00575 
00576     table.name = table_name_str.c_str();
00577     table.id = ival;
00578     table.generation = 0;
00579 
00580     sprintf(start_row, "%d:", ival);
00581     sprintf(end_row, "%d:%s", ival, Key::END_ROW_MARKER);
00582 
00583     scan_spec.row_limit = 0;
00584     scan_spec.max_versions = 1;
00585     scan_spec.columns.clear();
00586     scan_spec.columns.push_back("Location");
00587     scan_spec.start_row = start_row;
00588     scan_spec.start_row_inclusive = true;
00589     scan_spec.end_row = end_row;
00590     scan_spec.end_row_inclusive = true;
00591     scan_spec.interval.first = 0;
00592     scan_spec.interval.second = 0;
00593     scan_spec.return_deletes=false;
00594 
00595     scanner_ptr = m_metadata_table_ptr->create_scanner(scan_spec);
00596 
00597     while (scanner_ptr->next(cell)) {
00598       location_str = String((const char *)cell.value, cell.value_len);
00599       boost::trim(location_str);
00600       if (location_str != "" && location_str != "!")
00601         unique_locations.insert(location_str);
00602     }
00603 
00604     if (!unique_locations.empty()) {
00605       boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(m_mutex);
00606       DropTableDispatchHandler sync_handler(table, m_conn_manager_ptr->get_comm(), 30);
00607       RangeServerStatePtr state_ptr;
00608       ServerMapT::iterator iter;
00609 
00610       for (std::set<String>::iterator loc_iter = unique_locations.begin(); loc_iter != unique_locations.end(); loc_iter++) {
00611         if ((iter = m_server_map.find(*loc_iter)) != m_server_map.end()) {
00612           sync_handler.add( (*iter).second->addr );
00613         }
00614         else {
00615           saved_error = Error::RANGESERVER_UNAVAILABLE;
00616           err_msg = *loc_iter;
00617         }
00618       }
00619 
00620       if (!sync_handler.wait_for_completion()) {
00621         std::vector<DropTableDispatchHandler::ErrorResultT> errors;
00622         sync_handler.get_errors(errors);
00623         for (size_t i=0; i<errors.size(); i++) {
00624           HT_WARNF("drop table error - %s - %s", errors[i].msg.c_str(), Error::get_text(errors[i].error));
00625         }
00626         cb->error(errors[0].error, errors[0].msg);
00627         return;
00628       }
00629     }
00630 
00631   }
00632 
00633   if (saved_error != Error::OK) {
00634     HT_ERRORF("DROP TABLE failed '%s' - %s", err_msg.c_str(), Error::get_text(error));
00635     cb->error(saved_error, err_msg);
00636     return;
00637   }
00638   else if ((error = m_hyperspace_ptr->unlink(table_file.c_str())) != Error::OK) {
00639     HT_ERRORF("Problem removing hyperspace file - %s", Error::get_text(error));
00640     cb->error(error, (String)"Problem removing file '" + table_file + "'");
00641     return;
00642   }
00643 
00644   HT_INFOF("DROP TABLE '%s' id=%d success", table_name_str.c_str(), ival);
00645   cb->response_ok();
00646   cout << flush;
00647 }
00648 
00649 
00650 int Master::create_table(const char *tableName, const char *schemaString, String &errMsg) {
00651   int error = Error::OK;
00652   String finalSchema = "";
00653   String tableFile = (String)"/hypertable/tables/" + tableName;
00654   string tableBaseDir;
00655   string lgDir;
00656   Schema *schema = 0;
00657   list<Schema::AccessGroup *> *lgList;
00658   bool exists;
00659   HandleCallbackPtr nullHandleCallback;
00660   uint64_t handle;
00661   uint32_t table_id;
00662 
00663   m_hyperspace_ptr->set_silent_flag(true);
00664 
00668   if ((error = m_hyperspace_ptr->exists(tableFile, &exists)) != Error::OK) {
00669     errMsg = (String)"Problem checking for existence of table file '" + tableFile + "'";
00670     goto abort;
00671   }
00672   if (exists) {
00673     errMsg = tableName;
00674     error = Error::MASTER_TABLE_EXISTS;
00675     goto abort;
00676   }
00677 
00681   schema = Schema::new_instance(schemaString, strlen(schemaString));
00682   if (!schema->is_valid()) {
00683     errMsg = schema->get_error_string();
00684     error = Error::MASTER_BAD_SCHEMA;
00685     goto abort;
00686   }
00687   schema->assign_ids();
00688   schema->render(finalSchema);
00689 
00693   if ((error = m_hyperspace_ptr->open(tableFile, OPEN_FLAG_READ|OPEN_FLAG_WRITE|OPEN_FLAG_CREATE, nullHandleCallback, &handle)) != Error::OK) {
00694     errMsg = "Unable to create Hyperspace table file '" + tableFile + "' (" + Error::get_text(error) + ")";
00695     goto abort;
00696   }
00697 
00701   {
00702     if (!strcmp(tableName, "METADATA"))
00703       table_id = 0;
00704     else {
00705       table_id = (uint32_t)atomic_inc_return(&m_last_table_id);
00706       if ((error = m_hyperspace_ptr->attr_set(m_master_file_handle, "last_table_id", &table_id, sizeof(int32_t))) != Error::OK) {
00707         errMsg = (String)"Problem setting attribute 'last_table_id' of file /hypertable/master - " + Error::get_text(error);
00708         goto abort;
00709       }
00710     }
00711 
00712     if ((error = m_hyperspace_ptr->attr_set(handle, "table_id", &table_id, sizeof(int32_t))) != Error::OK) {
00713       errMsg = (String)"Problem setting attribute 'table_id' of file " + tableFile + " - " + Error::get_text(error);
00714       goto abort;
00715     }
00716   }
00717 
00718 
00722   if ((error = m_hyperspace_ptr->attr_set(handle, "schema", finalSchema.c_str(), strlen(finalSchema.c_str()))) != Error::OK) {
00723     errMsg = (String)"Problem creating attribute 'schema' for table file '" + tableFile + "'";
00724     goto abort;
00725   }
00726 
00727   m_hyperspace_ptr->close(handle);
00728 
00732   tableBaseDir = (string)"/hypertable/tables/" + tableName + "/";
00733   lgList = schema->get_access_group_list();
00734 
00735   for (list<Schema::AccessGroup *>::iterator lgIter = lgList->begin();
00736       lgIter != lgList->end(); lgIter++) {
00737     lgDir = tableBaseDir + (*lgIter)->name;
00738     m_dfs_client->mkdirs(lgDir);
00739   }
00740 
00744   if (table_id != 0) {
00745     TableMutatorPtr mutator_ptr;
00746     KeySpec key;
00747     String metadata_key_str;
00748     struct sockaddr_in addr;
00749 
00750     mutator_ptr = m_metadata_table_ptr->create_mutator();
00751 
00752     metadata_key_str = String("") + table_id + ":" + Key::END_ROW_MARKER;
00753     key.row = metadata_key_str.c_str();
00754     key.row_len = metadata_key_str.length();
00755     key.column_qualifier = 0;
00756     key.column_qualifier_len = 0;
00757 
00758     try {
00759       key.column_family = "StartRow";
00760       mutator_ptr->set(0, key, 0, 0);
00761       mutator_ptr->flush();
00762     }
00763     catch (Hypertable::Exception &e) {
00764       // TODO: propagate exception
00765       HT_ERRORF("Problem updating METADATA with new table info (row key = %s) - %s", metadata_key_str.c_str(), e.what());
00766       exit(1);
00767     }
00768 
00773     TableIdentifier table;
00774     RangeSpec range;
00775     uint64_t soft_limit;
00776     RangeServerClient rsc(m_conn_manager_ptr->get_comm(), 30);
00777 
00778     table.name = tableName;
00779     table.id = table_id;
00780     table.generation = schema->get_generation();
00781 
00782     range.start_row = 0;
00783     range.end_row = Key::END_ROW_MARKER;
00784 
00785     {
00786       boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(m_mutex);
00787       if (m_server_map_iter == m_server_map.end())
00788         m_server_map_iter = m_server_map.begin();
00789       assert(m_server_map_iter != m_server_map.end());
00790       memcpy(&addr, &((*m_server_map_iter).second->addr), sizeof(struct sockaddr_in));
00791       HT_INFOF("Assigning first range %s[%s:%s] to %s", table.name, range.start_row, range.end_row, (*m_server_map_iter).first.c_str());
00792       m_server_map_iter++;
00793       soft_limit = m_max_range_bytes / std::min(64, (int)m_server_map.size()*2);
00794     }
00795 
00796     try {
00797       RangeState range_state;
00798       range_state.soft_limit = soft_limit;
00799       rsc.load_range(addr, table, range, 0, range_state, 0);
00800     }
00801     catch (Exception &e) {
00802       String addrStr;
00803       HT_ERRORF("Problem issuing 'load range' command for %s[..%s] at server %s - %s",
00804                 table.name, range.end_row, InetAddr::string_format(addrStr, addr), Error::get_text(e.code()));
00805     }
00806   }
00807 
00808   if (m_verbose) {
00809     HT_INFOF("Successfully created table '%s' ID=%d", tableName, table_id);
00810   }
00811 
00812 abort:
00813   m_hyperspace_ptr->set_silent_flag(false);
00814   delete schema;
00815   if (error != Error::OK) {
00816     if (m_verbose) {
00817       HT_ERRORF("%s '%s'", Error::get_text(error), errMsg.c_str());
00818     }
00819   }
00820   return error;
00821 }
00822 
00823 
00828 bool Master::initialize() {
00829   int error;
00830   bool exists;
00831   uint64_t handle;
00832   HandleCallbackPtr nullHandleCallback;
00833 
00834   if ((error = m_hyperspace_ptr->exists("/hypertable/master", &exists)) == Error::OK && exists &&
00835       (error = m_hyperspace_ptr->exists("/hypertable/servers", &exists)) == Error::OK && exists)
00836     return true;
00837 
00838   if (!create_hyperspace_dir("/hypertable"))
00839     return false;
00840 
00841   if (!create_hyperspace_dir("/hypertable/servers"))
00842     return false;
00843 
00844   if (!create_hyperspace_dir("/hypertable/tables"))
00845     return false;
00846 
00850   if ((error = m_hyperspace_ptr->open("/hypertable/master", OPEN_FLAG_READ|OPEN_FLAG_WRITE|OPEN_FLAG_CREATE, nullHandleCallback, &handle)) != Error::OK) {
00851     HT_ERRORF("Unable to open Hyperspace file '/hypertable/master' (%s)", Error::get_text(error));
00852     return false;
00853   }
00854   m_master_file_handle = handle;
00855 
00859   uint32_t table_id = 0;
00860   if ((error = m_hyperspace_ptr->attr_set(m_master_file_handle, "last_table_id", &table_id, sizeof(int32_t))) != Error::OK) {
00861     HT_ERRORF("Problem setting attribute 'last_table_id' of file /hypertable/master - %s", Error::get_text(error));
00862     return false;
00863   }
00864 
00865   m_hyperspace_ptr->close(handle);
00866   m_master_file_handle = 0;
00867 
00871   if ((error = m_hyperspace_ptr->open("/hypertable/root", OPEN_FLAG_READ|OPEN_FLAG_WRITE|OPEN_FLAG_CREATE, nullHandleCallback, &handle)) != Error::OK) {
00872     HT_ERRORF("Unable to open Hyperspace file '/hypertable/root' (%s)", Error::get_text(error));
00873     return false;
00874   }
00875   m_hyperspace_ptr->close(handle);
00876 
00877   HT_INFO("Successfully Initialized Hypertable.");
00878 
00879   return true;
00880 }
00881 
00882 
00886 void Master::scan_servers_directory() {
00887   boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(m_mutex);
00888   int error;
00889   HandleCallbackPtr lockFileHandler;
00890   std::vector<struct DirEntryT> listing;
00891   uint32_t lockStatus;
00892   struct LockSequencerT lockSequencer;
00893   RangeServerStatePtr statePtr;
00894   uint32_t oflags;
00895   String hsFilename;
00896 
00900   m_servers_dir_callback_ptr = new ServersDirectoryHandler(this, m_app_queue_ptr);
00901 
00902   if ((error = m_hyperspace_ptr->open("/hypertable/servers", OPEN_FLAG_READ, m_servers_dir_callback_ptr, &m_servers_dir_handle)) != Error::OK) {
00903     HT_ERRORF("Unable to open Hyperspace directory '/hypertable/servers' (%s)  Try re-running with --initialize",
00904                  Error::get_text(error));
00905     exit(1);
00906   }
00907 
00908   if ((error = m_hyperspace_ptr->readdir(m_servers_dir_handle, listing)) != Error::OK) {
00909     HT_ERRORF("Problem scanning Hyperspace directory '/hypertable/servers' - %s", Error::get_text(error));
00910     exit(1);
00911   }
00912 
00913   oflags = OPEN_FLAG_READ | OPEN_FLAG_WRITE | OPEN_FLAG_LOCK;
00914 
00915   for (size_t i=0; i<listing.size(); i++) {
00916 
00917     statePtr = new RangeServerState();
00918     statePtr->location = listing[i].name;
00919 
00920     hsFilename = (String)"/hypertable/servers/" + listing[i].name;
00921 
00922     lockFileHandler = new ServerLockFileHandler(statePtr, this, m_app_queue_ptr);
00923 
00924     if ((error = m_hyperspace_ptr->open(hsFilename, oflags, lockFileHandler, &statePtr->hyperspaceHandle)) != Error::OK) {
00925       HT_ERRORF("Problem opening discovered server file %s - %s", hsFilename.c_str(), Error::get_text(error));
00926       continue;
00927     }
00928 
00929     if ((error = m_hyperspace_ptr->try_lock(statePtr->hyperspaceHandle, LOCK_MODE_EXCLUSIVE, &lockStatus, &lockSequencer)) != Error::OK) {
00930       HT_ERRORF("Problem obtaining exclusive lock on master Hyperspace file '/hypertable/master' - %s", Error::get_text(error));
00931       continue;
00932     }
00933 
00934     if (lockStatus == LOCK_STATUS_GRANTED) {
00935       HT_INFOF("Obtained lock on servers file %s, removing...", hsFilename.c_str());
00936       if ((error = m_hyperspace_ptr->unlink(hsFilename)) != Error::OK)
00937         HT_INFOF("Problem deleting Hyperspace file %s", hsFilename.c_str());
00938       if ((error = m_hyperspace_ptr->close(statePtr->hyperspaceHandle)) != Error::OK)
00939         HT_INFOF("Problem closing handle on deleting Hyperspace file %s", hsFilename.c_str());
00940     }
00941     else {
00942       m_server_map[statePtr->location] = statePtr;
00943     }
00944   }
00945 
00946 }
00947 
00948 
00952 bool Master::create_hyperspace_dir(const String &dir) {
00953   int error;
00954   bool exists;
00955 
00959   if ((error = m_hyperspace_ptr->exists(dir, &exists)) != Error::OK) {
00960     HT_ERRORF("Problem checking for existence of directory '%s' - %s", dir.c_str(), Error::get_text(error));
00961     return false;
00962   }
00963 
00964   if (exists)
00965     return true;
00966 
00967   if ((error = m_hyperspace_ptr->mkdir(dir)) != Error::OK) {
00968     HT_ERRORF("Problem creating directory '%s' - %s", dir.c_str(), Error::get_text(error));
00969     return false;
00970   }
00971 
00972   return true;
00973 }
00974 
00975 void Master::join() {
00976   m_app_queue_ptr->join();
00977   m_threads.join_all();
00978 }
